titles.title: National MEP Supply Chain Database Act of 2022
National MEP Supply Chain Database Act of 2021
National MEP Supply Chain Database Act of 2022
A bill to establish a National Manufacturing Extension Partnership Supply Chain Database, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Cantwell with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 598.

bill.summary:
National MEP Supply Chain Database Act of 2022
This bill requires the National Institute of Standards and Technology to establish a database that provides a national overview of the networks of U.S. supply chains.
